title: What music playlist describes you the best? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hmmm… I never really gave it much thought. Let’s see, what would be the soundtrack to describe good ol’ Razz: Alice Cooper - Your Own Worst EnemyI guess the title alone describes me pretty good, the lyrics are full of examples how the main character sabotages his own life. I guess you could call that song my inofficial hymn.Queen - Fat Bottomed GirlsNot only does this song a good job to describe the type of woman I am, but also the type of woman I like.Steel Panther - Fuck Everybody / Alice Cooper - It’s The Little ThingsYeah, sometimes this world just drives me mad.The Clash - I’m not downI've been through a lot in my life but there’s always something that keeps me from staying down for too long, even if it’s mostly just that I just don’t want to grant all those assholes the satisfaction of winning.Babymetal - Gimme ChocolateWhat can I say? I just like candy.Alice Cooper - Might As Well Be On MarsThe story of my whole love life. People I like just can’t see me.The Darkness - Last Of Our KindThis is how I often feel when people talk about movies, music and other stuff and most of the ones I like are from times before I was even born.The Darkness - Heavy Metal LoverI mean, there’s not much in this playlist that doesn’t feature at least some more or less heavily distorted guitars, is there?

I have had this playlist for a few months now, it’s only on Amazon Music though. I don’t want write the link here and get banned so I had to write song by song. The playlist that best describes me is called: I Am Emotional Abusive Most songs on this playlist describes me the best possible way, all are directed to how Toxic I became, some of them are how I made the person I was with feel and some are of how I feel about myself or how I should have been. I hope I didn’t make anymore mistakes on spelling as I haven’t sleep in 24 hours. Queen - I Want To Break Free ( The Original Soundtrack)Imagine Dragons - I Bet My LifeLinkin Park - CrawlingThe Red Jumpsuit Apparatus - Face DownGreen Day - Boulevard Of Broken Dreams (Explicit)Eminem - Love The Way You Los ( feat. Rihanna) (Explicit)The Police - Every Breath You Take (Remastered 2003)Birdy - Words As WeaponsBon Jovi - You Give Love A Bad NamePearl Jam - Better Man (Explicit)Katy Perry - Hot N Cold (Explicit)The Stylistics - Break Up Or Make UpBeyonce - JealousHozier - Cherry Wine (Live)Sara Bareilles - King Of AnythingKelly Clarkson - Because Of YouChristina Aguilera - FighterKesha - Praying (Explicit)Linkin Park - Leave Out All The Rest (Explicit)Imagine Dragons / Next To MeMaluma - HP (Explicit) < I am the HP hijueputa >Becky G - Sola < I didn’t discard her but it may seem that way, she’s not a supply as I won’t move on and I still feel something for her >Lady Antebellum - What If I Never Get Over YouDJ Snake - Taki Taki (feat. Selena Gomez & Ozuna & Cardi B) (Explicit) < this was a song she & liked and for that I bond it with feeling sorry for being toxic, it makes me sad to hear it as I remember some happy moments that make sad now >Ozuna - Te Vas < she’s gone, I lost my Best friend and a great person forever >Do Snake - Loco Contigo < yes I am going crazy thinking about her. My heart has turned to stone and I am not the same person as my family recalls >Becky G - Bubalu (the lyrics say how much he misses her, he never valued her and all she did, these words hit rock bottom in my broken and toxic heart)Blonde Redhead- For The DamagesTaylor Swift - MeanAlanis Morisette - Narcissus < it makes me belief I have BPD with Narcissist traits.Sarah McLachlan - Building A Mystery (Explicit)’Til Tuesday - Voices Carry (Expanded edition)Rollins Band - LiarAdele - Set Fire To The RainVertical Horizon - Everything You WantPassenger - Let Her Go < this is the saddest true song, every time it comes on my Work speakers, I know she’s better off without me but is so sad I became toxic and I miss her so much, it makes me cry all the time and they play it twice within 8 hour period.Bruce Hornsby - The Way It IsGrandson - Rock Bottom (Explicit)Ruel - PainkillerRobin Schulz - Speechless (feat. Erika Sirola)Disciple - Cuff The CriminalLindsey Starling - Crystallize < it’s a Dubstep song, it has highs and lows and I associate it with the pain and suffering she went through, I wish I have been supportive and a good boyfriend.Halsey - Sorry (Explicit)Demon Hunter - One Thousand ApologiesLil’ Happy Lil’ Sad - Let Me DieJoan Jett & The Black Hearts - I Hate Myself For Loving You < I am sure she hates me for feeling something for me as well as I self loath to waste her time & life.Maddie & Tae - Die From A Broken HeartSomething Like Kites - Waking UpDella Reese - Why Don’t You Do RightPlacebo - A Million Little PiecesDella Reese - Don’t Worry About MeStabbing Westward - Save Yourself (Explicit)Mark Ronson (feat. YEBBA) - Dont Leave Me LonelyPink - F**kin’ Perfect (Explicit)Justin Timberland - What Goes Around Comes AroundBabyface (feat. Stevie Wonder) - How Come, How LongChristina Perri - Jar of HeartsEvanescence - My InmortalSeether (feat. Amy Lee) - BrokenPuddle of Mudd -She Hates Me (Explicit)Staind - It’s Been Awhile (Explicit)Ed Sherran - Give Me Love
